articles.description: 'Alexa, I want to win the Echo Dot Smart Speaker.' Head over to the InYourArea Instagram for your chance to win the giveaway prize for Advent Day 15.
articles.content:
Alexa, I want to win the giveaway. Scroll down to find out how.
Ask and you shall receive with the latest InYourArea Advent calendar giveaway prize. 
We're giving one lucky InYourArea user the chan… [+1669 chars]

articles.author: Sam Stevenson
articles.title: Gmail 'hacked': Google users warned of massive data breach after global outage - Express
articles.description: GMAIL users have been warned of a potentially massive data breach after Google services went down for millions of people across the world.
